sql.if: and a.category_id in (SELECT a.id FROM g_news_category a WHERE a.ref_id =#{categoryId} )

if.if: AND a.start_date <= NOW() AND a.end_date >= NOW()

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) as total FROM g_news_article a WHERE 1=1 AND a.delete_flag = 0
mapper.insert: insert into g_news_article (category_id,title,platform, content,describes,images, creator, updator,start_date,end_date,create_time ) values (#{categoryId},#{title},#{platform}, #{content},#{describes},#{images}, #{creator},#{updator},#{startDate},#{endDate}, now() )
mapper.update:
update g_news_article a set
a.category_id = #{categoryId},
a.title = #{title},
a.platform = #{platform},
a.content = #{content},
a.describes = #{describes},
a.images = #{images},
a.start_date = #{startDate},
a.end_date = #{endDate},
a.updator = #{updator},
update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE g_news_article a set a.delete_flag=1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.`name`, a.id FROM g_news_category a WHERE a.`level` = 2 AND a.delete_flag = 0

SELECT a.category_id as categoryId, a.start_date as startDate, a.end_date as endDate, a.platform, a.title, a.content, a.images, a.describes, a.id FROM g_news_article a WHERE 1 = 1
limit 0,1

SELECT a.title, a.content, a.describes, a.images, a.create_time as createTime, ( SELECT COUNT(ggc.id) FROM g_news_article b LEFT JOIN g_global_correlation ggc ON ggc.ref_id = b.id AND ggc.ref_type = 5 and ggc.delete_flag=0 WHERE a.id = b.id ) AS likes, ( SELECT if(COUNT(ggc.id)>0,1,0) FROM g_news_article b LEFT JOIN g_global_correlation ggc ON ggc.ref_id = b.id AND ggc.ref_type = 5 and ggc.delete_flag=0 WHERE a.id = b.id and ggc.user_id=#{userId} ) AS isLikes, ( SELECT COUNT(ggc.id) FROM g_news_article b LEFT JOIN g_global_correlation ggc ON ggc.ref_id = b.id AND ggc.ref_type = 6 and ggc.delete_flag=0 WHERE a.id = b.id ) AS browses FROM g_news_article a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.delete_flag = 0 and a.id=#{articleId}

SELECT a.title, a.images, a.describes, a.id, a.create_time as createTime FROM g_news_article a WHERE 1 = 1 and a.delete_flag=0 and a.category_id=#{categoryId}
limit ${start},${limit}
